name: .MPT File Extension
summary: Learn about .MPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An MPT file is a template created by Microsoft Project, a project management application. It contains a pre-defined structure, including a project timeline, tasks, and monetary budget. Project users utilize MPT files as a starting point for creating .MPP projects.

content: Microsoft introduced Project in 1984 and has since released subsequent versions. The software allows you to manage projects by developing schedules, tracking progress, assigning tasks, and analyzing budgets.
To save a project as a template in Microsoft Project, follow these steps:
With the project already open, click File → Export.
Click Save Project as File, then choose Project Template.
Name the template and click Save.
To create a project from a template in Microsoft Project, follow these steps:
Choose the template you want to use by searching your templates or online templates.
Click Create in the preview dialog box of the template you selected.

instructions: You can open and edit an MPT template with Microsoft Project in Windows. You can also open an MPT file with third-party applications, such as MOOS Project Viewer and MPXJ.
